org.openimaj.kestrel

Class SimpleKestrelClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.kestrel.SimpleKestrelClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class SimpleKestrelClient
extends Object
implements Closeable
    A simple Kestrel client taken from https://github.com/hogelog/simple-kestrel-client by Hogelog. Using this one over KestrelThriftClient which seemed to have some major issues
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
